intro: Aregelia spectabilis, commonly known as the showy aregelia, is a flowering plant native to the Andes mountains of South America. The plant typically grows in high-altitude regions, thriving in cool, moist environments with well-drained soil. Aregelia spectabilis is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and ability to attract pollinators like hummingbirds and bees.
